detail_desc: Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with an intarsia motif. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a V-neck front and back and long sleeves.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with half-length puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a V-neck at the back with a horizontal strap at the back of the neck and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. and an added layer of lace at the hem.
Tube scarf knitted in soft cotton with ribbed trims and a small appliqué at the bottom.
Sleeveless top in satin with a lace trim in a narrow cut at the top with an opening at the front, and shoulder straps that tie at the back of the neck.
Sleeveless blouse in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck, lace yoke, small lace frill at the shoulders and drawstring under the bust.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with a double-layered skirt in glittery tulle. Picot trim around the neckline, a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and a decorative bow at the waist.
Cotton flannel shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, chest pocket and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Cropped top in crinkled jersey that can be worn as an off-the-shoulder top with a square neckline and short puff sleeves. Narrow elastication and a small frill trim at the top and around the sleeves and hem.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with a zip down the front and along one leg, long sleeves and full feet.
Sunglasses with plastic frames, sidepieces in chain- shaped metal with plastic ends, and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Slim-fit trousers in washed cotton twill with a lightly brushed finish. Adjustable, elasticated waist, a zip fly and press-stud and front and back pockets.
Double-breasted jacket in a jacquard weave with notch lapels, and welt front pockets. Gently tapered waist, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist and jacquard-patterned details. Seamless.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric. Slightly looser fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.

Imitation suede sandals with covered block heels, fringed straps at the front and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Captain's cap in a cotton weave with metal buttons at the sides and braiding at the front. Quilted lining.
Waistcoat in woven fabric with buttons down the front, fake front pockets and an adjustable tab at the back. Lined.
Oval sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Shorts in soft, washed cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, fake fly with a button, fake front pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Oversized, straight-cut T-shirt in a soft modal and cotton jersey blend with a ribbed neckline and low dropped shoulders.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Shaftless socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
Short dress in washed, stretch denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and chest pockets. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt.

Blouse in an airy, patterned weave with a small stand-up collar, V-neck, button placket and chest pocket. Gathered yoke at the back, gathered shoulder seams, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, wide dress in woven fabric with a round neckline, small opening and button at the back of the neck, and long sleeves.
Briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with contrasting colour ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Imitation leather trainers with a padded tongue and edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Long, sleeveless dress in chiffon crêpe with a hook-and-eye fastener at the back of the neck, concealed zip at the back and a seam at the waist with beaded and sequined embroidery. Lined.
Oversized jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Short, straight-cut dress in a patterned crêpe weave with long sleeves. Opening with a button at the back of the neck and a seam at the waist. Unlined.
Jersey trousers with a regular, elasticated waist and straight, wide legs.

Short dress in woven fabric made from recycled polyester with a deep V-neck, shaped cups and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Seam under the bust and at the waist. Flared skirt in several pleated tiers. Concealed zip at the back made partly from recycled polyester. Recycled polyester lining.
Treggings in soft, stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Fully lined, V-neck swimsuit with lightly padded cups and narrow adjustable shoulder straps.
Short wide metal chain necklace with a toggle clasp. Length 42 cm.
Padded gilet in woven fabric with a detachable hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Lined.
Fitted jacket in washed, stretch denim with buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, and side pockets.
Calf-length skirt in a pleated weave with a high, elasticated waist. Lined.
Longer top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a lace trim at the top, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
V-neck top in soft jersey with short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and short slits in the sides.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details with patches on the inside, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and zip fly with a press-stud.
Short-sleeved dress in soft jersey with a round neck, print motif on the front and a gathered, elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Joggers in soft cotton jersey with elasticated ribbing at the waist, discreet side pockets and ribbed hems.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and a motif.
Short shorts in a crêpe weave with a high waist, small frill trim at the top and side pockets.
Sandals in imitation leather with glittery straps at the front and an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening at one side. Imitation leather linings and insoles and fluted soles.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Fully lined swimsuit made partly from recycled polyester with a deep neckline front and back. Zigzag seams along the edges, high-cut legs, and cutaway coverage at the back.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and a fake welt back pocket with a button.

Short jacket in sturdy canvas with a fleece-lined hood with a collar, drawstring and foldable faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs and a hook and loop fastening down the front. Chest pockets, flap front pockets with a hook and loop fastening, one zipped pocket concealed by the wind flap and one inner pocket with a press-stud. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Quilted lining and polyester filling.
Short dressing gown in crisp cotton poplin with dropped shoulders, wide, 3/4-length sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket.
Wedge-heel sandals with narrow straps in imitation suede. Double ankle strap with an adjustable metal buckle, and a braided jute trim around the soles. Heel 7 cm, platform front 1.5 cm.

Small backpack in imitation leather with a handle and zip at the top, adjustable shoulder straps and a zipped outer compartment with a small appliqué on the front. Lined. Height approx. 27 cm. Width approx. 18 cm.
Straight-cut shirt dress in a soft weave with a collar, buttons down the front and chest pockets with a pleat. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
High-waisted leggings in sturdy cotton jersey. Visible elastic waistband with a text motif.
Shirt in a linen weave with a turn-down collar, button placket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Baby Exclusive. Sun hat in a soft weave lined in a cotton weave. Ties under the chin (not in size 0-4M).
Short dress in an airy viscose weave with shoulder straps, a frill trim at the top and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Wide, ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a concealed zip in one side.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in organic cotton denim with an extra-high waist, zip fly and button, and extra-wide legs that taper to the hems.
Lightly padded gilet with a lined hood and zip down the front. Side pockets, a zipped inner pocket and an elasticated drawstring at the hem. Polyester filling. Lined.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a velvety finish. Detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim, a pile-lined stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Drawstring at the waist, flap front pockets with a press-stud, and a single back vent. Quilted lining.
Short jacket in imitation suede with fringing along the yoke and sleeves. No fasteners. Lined.
Long, sleeveless dress in pleated jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck and a sewn-in wrapover at the top. Elasticated seam and a narrow tie belt at the waist. Lined front bodice.
Windbreaker in woven fabric with a detachable hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Welt side pockets and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Shoe boots with elastic gores in the sides, pointed toes and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 4.5 cm.
Jacket in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Set with a dungaree dress and top in soft cotton. Dress in woven fabric with adjustable straps that cross at the back, a gathered seam at the waist and elastication at the sides. Unlined. Short-sleeved jersey top.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Calf-length coat in a recycled Italian wool blend with notch lapels and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Diagonal side pockets, an inner pocket and a high-cut single back vent. Lining in twill made from recycled polyester.
Maxi dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Gathered, elasticated seam at the waist and a straight-cut skirt with high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft jersey with a collar and button placket.

Short dress in a viscose weave with a small V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and decorative buttons at the top. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Short skirt in a woven Tencel™ lyocell blend with a high waist and detachable tie belt. Buttons down the front and patch front pockets. Unlined.
